SNData¶

SNData provides a Python interface for data releases published by various supernova surveys. It is currently under ongoing development.

Available Data¶

Survey Name Data Release Data Type External Link
Carnegie Supernova Survey DR1 Spectroscopic here
DR3 Photometric here
Dark Energy Survey SN3YR Photometric here
Sloan Digital Sky Survey SDSS-II Photometric here
